duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support performing duties related to customer service, stocking, and sanitation in assigned department(s).
Follow department procedures for preparing, storing, rotating, and stocking of product.
Prepare, package, weigh, and price products for sale.
Monitor product quality and freshness and ensure proper product rotation.
Ensure cases and shelves are clean and well-stocked.
Complete spoilage, sampling, temperature, and sweep logs as required.
Arrive to workstation on time, groomed, and dressed appropriately.
Provide excellent customer service and model suggestive selling techniques.
Maximize sales potential through effective procedures for prepping, storing, rotating, stocking, and merchandising product.
Maintain a clean and sanitary working and shopping environment.
Maintain equipment in accordance with cleanliness and safety standards.
Immediately report safety hazards and violations.
